author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Reminder to Customers Travelling on The Domestic Air Bridge Between Trinidad & Tobago For Great Race & Independence Day WeekendsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Reminder to Customers Travelling on The Domestic Air Bridge Between Trinidad & Tobago For Great Race & Independence Day Weekends Published on : Friday, August 21, 2015
Caribbean Airlines reminds its valued customers travelling on the domestic air bridge between Trinidad and Tobago for the upcoming Great Race and Independence Day weekends to please ensure that they are holding valid, confirmed tickets for specific dates and times.
Flights on the weekends of Great Race (August 21-23) and Independence Day (August 28-31) are booked and only customers holding confirmed tickets for travel to/from Tobago will be accommodated. Persons not holding confirmed bookings will only be accommodated if there are no shows for confirmed flights.
Customers with confirmed bookings travelling on the domestic air bridge are kindly asked to check-in at least two hours prior to the scheduled departure time of their flights.
Source: Caribbean Airlines
